message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's worth a lot to me, but I believe it would be even more valuable for your business. I'm proposing a price of $900,000. This reflects the significant value it brings and allows for some flexibility in the negotiation. Let's talk!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay up to $750,000 for it, which I believe is a fair reflection of its worth to my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750,000 is unfortunately too low for me. The value of this product is truly exceptional, and I'm confident it will significantly benefit your business. I'm willing to come down to $850,000, reflecting a compromise.  This is my best offer, let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $800,000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price given its value to my business.
